OOC: Roborick, i believe in reconciling the continuity.  This is the Bludgeon 
from the comic continuity.  Remmeber, if you want to be totally faithful to 
the old cartoon, you have to forget everything about saying the word Primus.  
I think i can fuse it together good enough, so please let me do the veteran 
thing.  Another thing is that in this RPG, impssible things happen.  I mean, 
Rhinox and Tankor co-exist! I'm trying to have some fun, so please?

:::Bludgeon:::

Bludgeon: I lead briefly, before the end of the war.
